title: Settings for `Typoradify'
description: Settings for `Typoradify' is seperated to two parts as they are supplied by different components.

autoNumbering.name: Auto numbering the math equations
autoNumbering.description: When toggled on, math equation will be automatically.

applyLineBreaks.name: Line breaks in math equation
applyLineBreaks.description: When toggled on, line breaks may happend in the math equation.

displayLineNumbers.name: Display line numbers in fenced codeblocks
displayLineNumbers.description: When toggled on, line numbers will appear in each line of codes.

theme.name: Typora Theme CSS
theme.description: The full path of a Typora Theme CSS file to render the file with.

customCss.name: Custom CSS
customCss.description: Custom CSS overwrites the CSS given above.

landscape.name: Paper direction
landscape.description: The paper direction when printing as PDF.

marginsType.name: Margins Type
marginsType.description: Paper margins type when printing as PDF.

pageSize.name: Page Size
pageSize.description: Page size when printing as PDF.

printBackground.name: Print Background
printBackground.description: When toggled on, background will appear when printing as PDF.
